title: General Pulaski Memorial Day, 2025
summary: The document is a presidential proclamation by Donald J. Trump, honoring General Casimir Pulaski on General Pulaski Memorial Day, October 11, 2025. Pulaski, a Polish nobleman, fought for American independence during the Revolutionary War, displaying exceptional courage and leadership. His actions, including saving General Washington's life at the Battle of Brandywine and leading cavalry charges, were pivotal in the fight for independence. Pulaski's legacy symbolizes the enduring bond between the United States and Poland, rooted in shared values of freedom and democracy. The proclamation encourages Americans to commemorate Pulaski's contributions and those of other patriots who have advanced the nation's ideals.
